name: SwapAzureCloudServiceDeploymentSlot
friendlyName: Swap Azure Cloud Service Deployment Slots
description: Swaps the VIP for a specified cloud service and optionally the configuration in parallel
author: Chris Taylor (Polaris Solutions)
helpMarkDown: Select the service you want swapped and mark the checkbox to include swapping configurations (.cscfg)

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure subscription to target for deployment.

inputs.name: IncludeConfiguration
inputs.label: Include Configuration (.cscfg)
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the cloud service configuration (.cscfg) will also be swapped between deployment slots

inputs.name: RemoveStagingDeploymentSlot
inputs.label: Delete Staging Deployment Slot
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the staging deployment slot will be deleted upon completion of task.  This is usually done to save resources from being charged.
